name: Energy Efficiency Grant for HOAs
description: Up to $25,000 grant for HOAs with 25+ units on D-1 rate to fund energy efficiency upgrades to common areas; 20% matching funds required
fullDescription: Silicon Valley Power offers substantial grants to HOAs in Santa Clara for energy efficiency upgrades to common areas, reducing shared utility costs for residents.
whatTheyOffer:
- Up to $25,000 grant for energy efficiency
- For HOAs with 25+ units on D-1 rate
- Funds common area upgrades
- Lighting, HVAC, and other efficiency projects
- 20% matching funds required from HOA
- Reduces shared utility costs
howToGetIt:
1. HOA must be in Santa Clara with 25+ units
2. Must be on D-1 electric rate
3. Plan energy efficiency upgrades for common areas
4. Submit application by June 30 or December 31
5. Include scope of work and quotes
6. HOA provides 20% matching funds
